body: Federal prosecutors yesterday presented vivid police testimony about two 1977 murders that they said they would tie to the conspiracy and car-theft charges against the reputed head of the Gambino crime organization and nine others on trial in Manhattan. Also testifying yesterday was an admitted car thief who said that a New York City policeman had
title: GAMBINO TRIAL HEARS CAR THIEF DESCRIBE WORK

body: When it comes to plastic garbage bags, the Sanitation Department has just about reached the breaking point. Plagued by sacks that split apart -spewing trash, releasing odors and inviting vermin - the agency may one day require the exclusive use of bags that meet its own durability standards, effectively banning the use of ''bargain bags.'' now on
title: NEW YORK DAY BY DAY; For a Tough City, Tough Garbage Bags . . .
